title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Call with Prime Minister Theresa May of the United Kingdom – The White House
content:
Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
November 1, 2017
President Donald J. Trump spoke today with Prime Minister Theresa May of the United Kingdom. Prime Minister May conveyed her condolences regarding the terrorist attack in New York on October 31. President Trump and Prime Minister May agreed on the importance of closer counterterrorism coordination between the United States and the United Kingdom.
